description: Try our easy to follow Egg, Cheese & Lettuce Wrap + Snacks recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Egg, Cheese & Lettuce Wrap + Snacks Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 Woolworths extra large free range eggs, 1 hardboiled, peeled, mashed for wrap (save 1 raw for muffins)

recipeInstructions.text: Combine mashed egg and yoghurt in a bowl. Place egg mixture in centre of wrap. Top with lettuce, tasty cheese and carrot. Wrap to enclose.

Snack 1 : To make wholemeal banana face muffins, preheat oven to 200oC/180oC fanforced. Line 9 holes of a 1/2 cup-capacity muffin pan with paper cases. Mash banana in a large bowl. Add extra egg, honey and milk and mix until well combined. Stir in flour until just combined (do not over-mix). Divide mixture among holes. Press sultanas into top of each muffin to make eyes and a nose (place sultanas quite close together, as muffins expand during baking). Bake for 15 minutes or until golden and just firm. Set aside to cool for 5 minutes before transferring to a wire rack to cool completely. Makes 9. Pack 1 muffin in an airtight container. Freeze remaining muffins until required.

Snack 2: Using a star cutter, cut stars from centre of apple slices. Place ricotta on half the apple slices, sprinkle with cinnamon and top with remaining apple slices. Pack in an airtight container with cucumber.
Snack 3: Pack seeds in an airtight container.
